backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, role-based access, ambulance locations, SOS alerts, and admin-controlled profile management with distance calculations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten JSON-style summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light and dark theme palettes for the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup flow, and routing users to ambulance or police interfaces.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying attribution and a caffeine.ai link with themed styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing branding, share link tools, user profile info, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/LinkDomainInfoPa: Dialog component explaining app share URL details and custom domain requirements.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login screen prompting users to authenticate via Internet Identity with emergency services branding.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component that lets a user enter their name, select a role, and save their profile via a mutation with error handling.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCont: UI control for copying a shareable app link with clipboard fallback handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, ambulance location updates, and SOS alert operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables and light/dark emergency-themed gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceInterface.ts: Ambulance UI that tracks geolocation, sends periodic location updates, and manages SOS activation/deactivation with backend sync.
frontend/src/pages/PoliceInterface.tsx: React page that tracks user geolocation, displays nearby ambulance locations and SOS alerts, filters stale data, and plays audio for new alerts.
frontend/src/utils/getShareUrl.ts: Returns the full current browser URL including origin, path, query, and hash.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, container settings, animations, and including several plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing features, issues, and requirements for fixing new-user onboarding and profile creation.
